markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Anugobu Apprentice](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1392)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most young anugobus undertake not just one, but many apprenticeships in order to learn advanced techniques in their trade of choice. The apprentice depicted here specializes in construction and engineering, but an anugobu is just as likely to take up cooking, hunting, tailoring, or really anything that piques their interest.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Anugobu_Apprentice.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Anugobu Apprentice](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1392)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Anugobu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=376" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +12; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Anugobu](/Languages.aspx?ID=85), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +8, [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Artisan's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 35

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet; stone step

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hammer +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
chisel +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hammer +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 bludgeoning

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 20, attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189) (at will)

**Planar Workshop**   An anugobu is intrinsically connected to small, pocket dimension that they typically refer to as their workshop. The workshop is an extradimensional 10-foot cube. The workshop holds an anugobu's collected tools and materials. An anugobu can enter or leave their planar workshop as an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) and [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) traits. The anugobu gains resistance 5 to all damage (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75)) and concealment while within the workshop. The workshop is only visible while the anugobu is inside it.

**Stone Step**   An anugobu can effortlessly stick to any worked or manufactured surface, allowing them to walk up walls and stand on ceilings.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-284" />
name: Anugobu Apprentice
